title: testfor功能在1.13如何实现
author: 璀璨LJT
txt_content: 就像之前的探测玩家装备物品，探测玩家手持物品这种还有其他的都不会弄了

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content: execute as @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:carrot_on_a_stick",tag:{display:{Name:"{"translate":"uin.tool_2.name"}"},HideFlags:63,Unbreakable:1b,Damage:2}}}] run tag @s add uin_cur_select复制代码execute as @s[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:barrier"}}] run tag @s add uin_barrier复制代码execute as @a[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:item_frame"}}] at @s run particle minecraft:happy_villager ^ ^1.62 ^1.5 0 0 0 0 1 force复制代码execute if entity @e[tag=uin_blink,nbt={Age:21}] run kill @e[tag=uin_blink]复制代码给...例子

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
直接用nbt选择器，点我签名看教程，有1.13的相关链接
例如  execute as @e[type=zombie,nbt={}] run say 1
